## August 2023

1. Updated code to combine diet data studies 
2. Updated salmon supplementation (see Salmon page for details). 
Supplementation proportions in the biology PRM are by functional group and consider stage in the functional group file
currently only juveniles are supplemented. IsSupplemented value of 1 means all life history stages will consume the supplemental feed, a value of 2 is juveniles only and a value of 
3 is adults only.
